name: v3.0.0 - Major Release
body:
## Breaking Changes

- Breaking: Removed deprecated PreToolUse hook in favor of onToolStart
- Breaking: Changed Task tool parameters - `run_in_background` renamed to `background`

## New Features

- Added new ToolSearch tool for discovering MCP tools by capability
- Introduced parallel agent execution with background mode

## Deprecations

- Deprecated: `oldPermissionFormat` will be removed in v4.0

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed typo in error message
- Fixed UI alignment issue
